verses.name: Leviticus 19:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Leviticus 19:2
verses.text: Speak unto all the congregation of the children of Israel, and say unto them, Ye shall be holy: for I the Lord your God am holy.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:3
verses.text: Ye shall fear every man his mother, and his father, and keep my sabbaths: I am the Lord your God.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:4
verses.text: Turn ye not unto idols, nor make to yourselves molten gods: I am the Lord your God.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:5
verses.text: And if ye offer a sacrifice of peace offerings unto the Lord, ye shall offer it at your own will.
